text: Lignières may refer to: *in Switzerland: **Lignières, Neuchâtel *in France: **Lignières, Aube **Lignières, Cher **Lignières, Loir-et-Cher **Lignières, Somme == Other == in France: * Lignières-Châtelain, in the Somme department * Lignières-de-Touraine, in the Indre-et-Loire department * Lignières-en-Vimeu, in the Somme department * Lignières-la-Carelle, in the Sarthe department * Lignières-Orgères, in the Mayenne department * Lignières-Sonneville, in the Charente department * Lignières-sur-Aire, in the Meuse department
title: Lignières
